cells.data:
What is the least amount of working features to have a playable game and when will it be done?

  1. Must have minimum number of obstacles
    1. Sawblade (left and right side)
    2. Portable burners (left and right side)
    3. Moving sawblades (left and right)
    4. Working levels
    5. Levels indicator
    6. Pause button
    7. Ability to restart game at last position
    8. Ability to save game to device or cloud (firebase?)
    9. Scoring system
    10. Sound effects
    11. Music
    12. Water bubbles
